tourBios.otherCarHigh: California State Amateur champion in 2007...Two-time All-American in 2011-12. Won four times in college, including the 2012 NCAA West Regional...Named all-state in high school three times...In his PGA TOUR debut, missed the cut at the 2009 Buick Invitational, outside San Diego. Missed the cut at the 2011 Farmers Insurance Open...Missed the cut as an amateur at PGA TOUR Canada's 2013 Times Colonist Island Savings Open in Ontario.
tourBios.personal: Attended Murrieta Valley (Calif.) High School...Earliest golf memory is attending the Shark Shootout with his father...Favorite golf courses include Royal County Down and Cypress Point and would like to play Augusta National and Pine Valley...Fan of the Los Angeles Dodgers, the Los Angeles Lakers and the Los Angeles Kings, as well as Kobe Bryant and Tom Brady...Dream foursome would include Bobby Jones, Ben Hogan and Seve Ballesteros...Never travels without his computer...Enjoys Japanese food and sushi, traveling to Hawaii, listening to Jay-Z and driving fast cars...Bucket list includes traveling to all of the continents...Is lefthanded but plays golf righthanded...Would like to trade places with DJ Hardwell for a day and play a big music festival...Favorite quote is "Form is temporary, class is permanent." Twitter is @Josh2Anderson.

tourBios.carHigh: 2013: Made five cuts in nine starts on PGA Tour Canada and wound up No. 44 on the Order of Merit. In mId-July, he T46 at the Dakota Dunes Open in Saskatchewan in his first professional start...Shot four rounds in the 60s to finish T4 at The Great Waterway Classic in August. Payday moved him from No. 97 to No. 38 on the Order of Merit at the time.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was the California State Amateur champion in 2007...Two-time All-American in 2011-12 at Pepperdine. Won four times in college, including the 2012 NCAA West Regional...Named all-state in high school three times...In his PGA TOUR debut, missed the cut at the 2009 Buick Invitational, outside San Diego. Missed the cut at the 2011 Farmers Insurance Open...Missed the cut as an amateur at PGA TOUR Canada's 2013 Times Colonist Island Savings Open in Ontario.
tourBios.personal: Attended Murrieta Valley (Calif.) High School...Earliest golf memory is attending the Shark Shootout with his father...Favorite golf courses include Royal County Down and Cypress Point and would like to play Augusta National and Pine Valley...Fan of the Los Angeles Dodgers, the Los Angeles Lakers and the Los Angeles Kings, as well as Kobe Bryant and Tom Brady...Dream foursome would include Bobby Jones, Ben Hogan and Seve Ballesteros...Never travels without his computer...Enjoys Japanese food and sushi, traveling to Hawaii, listening to Jay-Z and driving fast cars...Bucket list includes traveling to all of the continents...Is lefthanded but plays golf righthanded...Would like to trade places with DJ Hardwell for a day and play a big music festival...Favorite quote is "Form is temporary, class is permanent." Twitter is @Josh2Anderson.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T23rd in 2014 at the Nova Scotia Open.
